name: Mythic Meetup
description:
Welcome to Mythic Meetup - The Place to Meet and Mingle with Mythics Near You!

An unsuspecting human in search of a little more spice to their life, you have just followed a mysterious email link to ... a server of real life mythical creatures?? Well, this wasn't quite the dating pool you had in mind, but some of them have definitely got their eye on you!

Features
  • ~45k words (~4-6 hours of playtime) with 4 routes
  • Customizable username, pronouns, and profile picture
  • Interactive custom chat GUI
  • Fully voiced video and voice calls
  • Partial voicing of side characters and pets
  • 8 CGs + 4 promotional art pieces 
  • 8 endings with epilogues
  • 9 tracks in the OST
  • Memes, emotes, and shenanigans galore!

**Known Bugs: As of the 1.1 build, we are aware that there is code that breaks on Day 3 of watcher's route, which can be bypassed by hitting "ignore" multiple times. We will get this fixed as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience!

Content Warning

Abusive language, cursing, mildly suggestive content

Meet the Love Interests

** ProfessorX's route is only unlockable after playing through BestestBB's, OffKey's, and watcher's routes first. Should you wish to unlock ProfessorX's route without playing all of the others (not recommended), set your username to "LittleRabbit."

** The recommended route order is BestestBB = OffKey => watcher => ProfessorX.

Meet the Mythic Team Crew
